subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane scored two goals to lead the Blackhawks to a 3-1 victory over the Bruins in Game 5 and put Chicago one win away from the Stanley Cup.
snippet: Patrick Kane scored two goals to lead the Blackhawks to a 3-1 victory over the Bruins in Game 5 and put Chicago one win away from the Stanley Cup.
